description: Unique, de-identified identifier for the participant, assigned by data contributor. External IDs must be two steps removed from personal information in the study records.
Identifier for event (Visit, Survey completion, Sample collection, etc.) to which the Condition data are linked, if applicable. There may be multiple events linked to a Participant.
Type of event for which Event ID is given (Visit, Survey completion, Sample collection, etc.)
Participant's age at the time of the event
Indicates if this was the participant's first encounter
Indicates if this was the participant's last encounter
